title: Ammunition Discharging
command: Command from __NAME__ we have an excessive amount of ammunition discharging all around us. We are evacuating.

title: Breaking Glass Laceration
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has injured his hand by breaking glass it appears that he has an arterial bleed. We are bringing him out.

title: Broken Supply Line Civilian Injuries
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a rupture of our supply line that has cause multiple civilian injuries, send medics.

title: Broken Supply Line No Water
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a rupture of our supply line we are in the process of replacing the broken line to be without water for a couple of minutes.

title: Building Collapse No Escape Route
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a partial building collapse that is blocking our egress, we are searching for an alternative exit.

title: Building Collapse Trapped by Debris
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a partial building collapse, several crewmembers are trapped, unknown injuries, we need assistance to get out of the building.

title: Burn Victims
command: Command from __NAME__ we have located multiple burn victims, we are going to need assistance in removal and treatment on the exterior.

title: Captain Down Back Issue
command: Command from __NAME__ a crew member has slipped and fallen he has injured his back. Send in a backboard and an additional crew to help remove victim to the exterior.

title: Chest pain
command: Command from __NAME__ I am having severe chest pain I am making my way to the front door. Send medics.

title: Chimney Collapse
command: Command from __NAME__ we’ve had a chimney collapse nobody is injured but we have a structural stability issue.

title: Clogged Nozzle
command: Command from __NAME__ we have a clogged nozzle we’ve attempted to flush it with no success. We are backing out and will continue to try and clear the obstruction.

title: Complete pump failure
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had complete engine failure. We are currently working off of Hydrant pressure. Send an additional engine to pump for us.

title: Contact with energized electrical CPR in Progress
command: Command from __NAME__ crew member has come into contact with energized electrical powerlines, CPR is in progress we'll need assistance at the front door.

title: Contact with energized electrical injury
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has come in contact with the powerlines, he received a shock. He has numbness in his arm we are bringing him out. Can we verify that the power has been cut to the building.

title: Crawl off Balcony
command: Command from __NAME__ one of our crewmembers has just crawled off the balcony and has fallen to the first floor, please send help.

title: Drop Ceiling entangled in wires
command: Command from __NAME__ we are trapped in a drop ceiling that has collapsed on us. We are entangled in wires we are trying to work our way out, send assistance.

title: Empty Pool
command: Command from __NAME__ a crew member has fallen into an empty pool. He is unconscious and in need of assistance. Send medics.

title: Engine Failure
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had complete engine failure. We are currently working off of Hydrant pressure. Send an additional engine to pump for us.

title: Floor Collapse
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has fallen into the basement from a floor collapse. We are able to visualize him he is not moving send additional crews to the basement.

title: Facepiece knocked off
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighters mask has been knocked off and he has suffered severe smoking inhalation, we are assisting him to the front door. Send EMS.

title: Fall into basement
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has fallen through the floor into the basement. Unable to visualize him send additional crews to the basement.

title: Fall into full pool
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has fallen into a full swimming pool, his mask has been dislodged. He is drowning. We need assistance in getting him out of the pool.

title: Faulty Circuit Breaker
command: Command from __NAME__ we have a faulty circuit breaker we are unable to shut down the power. Be advised the building is still energized.

title: Flashover
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a single room flashover, no injuries, we have retreated to a safe location and will attempt to advance back into the firefight.

title: Floor gettting soft
command: Command from __NAME__ We are advancing but, this floor is getting soft we’re going to pull back and reevaluate.

title: Haz Mat Exposure
command: Command from __NAME__ we have come into contact with a drum labeled cyanide our entire crew has been contaminated, we are evacuating the building we’ll need decon.

title: HVAC Through the roof Injuries
command: Command from __NAME__ the HVAC has fallen through the roof, two firefighters are injured we'll need assistance in extricating them from the building.

title: HVAC Through the roof no Injuries
command: Command from __NAME__ the HVAC has fallen through the roof, no injuries but we are concerned about the structural stability.

title: HVAC Through the roof trapped
command: Command from __NAME__ the HVAC has fallen through the roof, no injuries but are egress is blocked looking for an alternative exit.

title: Ladder into power lines
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has touched Power lines with a ground ladder, appears to be uninjured. Can we get the power de-energized to the drop and medics to assess crewmember.

title: Ladder Slip Injuries
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has been injured on a ground ladder that has slipped, he rode the ladder to the ground and hit his head. He is unconcious.

title: Lost Nozzle Pressure
command: Command from __NAME__ Lost water pressure, we are taking on a lot of heat. We are backing out until we get our pressure back.

title: Pike pole into powerlines Injury
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has touched Power lines entering the structure with a pipe pole is still being electrocuted. Can we get the power de-energized to the drop.

title: Powerline drop blocking egress
command: Command from __NAME__ we have power lines dropped across our egress we have no way to exit the building. Can we get the power de-energized.

title: SCBA Failure Buddy Breathing
command: Command from __NAME__ we’ve had an SCBA malfunction. The high pressure hose is bad, we are buddy breathing and exiting the building. Send additional crews for backfill.

title: Shots Fired
command: Command from __NAME__ shots fired, shots fired, man with a gun in the structure. We are trapped in the building, we are taking cover.

title: Stairwell Collapse
command: Command from __NAME__ we’ve had a stairway collapse, we are searching for an alternative exit to the north side of the building.

title: Window AC fall and injured firefighter
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has injured by a falling window AC. He appears to have a head injury can we said to EMS to evaluate.

title: Fire in Void space
command: Command from __NAME__ we have discovered fire in void spaces above the ceiling.

title: Fall down stairwell
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a firefighter fall down a staiwell. He appaers to have a compound fracture to his lower leg. We can get him to the front door.

title: Fall into elevator shaft
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a firefighter fall down what it appears to be an elevator shaft. He appaers to have an injury to his lower leg. We can get him to the front door.

title: Powerline fall on apparatus
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had an energized power line drop across our engine. We are unable to control the pump can we get this de-energized?.

title: Hoarder Home (Excessive Fire Load)
command: Command from __NAME__ we have excessive fire load due to hoarding conditions. We are finding it difficult to maneuver around the structure.

title: O2 Cylinders exploding
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a Oxygen cylinder explode causing partial building collapse, no injuries. There are at least 10 cylinders with direct flame impingment.

title: Building Collapse evacuating
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a partial building collapse, no injuries we are making our way out of the building.

title: Bookshelf Fall Crewmember trapped
command: Command from __NAME__ we’ve had a bookshelf collapse on top of a crew member we are trying to extricate him now, send in an additional crew to help extricate.

title: Hash oil explosion
command: Command from __NAME__ we have come across a Hash Oil Operation. We have found flammable liquids and several burn victims. Please send a couple of additional companies to extricate and treat.

title: Ceiling collapse
command: Command from __NAME__ we have had a ceiling colapse and several firefighters have been burned, we are going to need assistance in removal and treatment on the exterior.

title: Runaway engine
command: Command from __NAME__ our rig has slipped out of pump and into drive. We have multiple injuries to civilians who were ran over by the rig. Send EMS and at least 3 ambulances.

title: Firefighter fall trough the roof
command: Command from __NAME__ firefighter has fallen through the roof. We need assistance inlocating him.
